articles.title: New unified theory shows how past landscapes drove the evolution of Earth's rich diversity of life - The Conversation
articles.description: For decades, scientists have tried to uncover the cause of long-term changes in Earth’s biodiversity. New simulations point at geography playing a critical role.

articles.title: Butler County gears up for once-in-a-lifetime 2024 total solar eclipse - WKRC TV Cincinnati
articles.description: As the moon crosses between Earth and the sun, a lot of Ohio will go dark.
articles.content:
HAMILTON, Ohio (WKRC) - We are less than six months away from a once-in-a-lifetime total solar eclipse in Ohio.
